Entries.Mon: Have you met Yri yet? We worked together on your house. #$b# She and i get along well since we both share a love for working with wood $h
Entries.Mon2: How do you like the Town? I mean design-wise, Yri and i worked on it for months. #$b# The original designs for the buildings were made by a designer from ZuZu City called Gweniaczek.#$b# We're grateful that she gave us the blueprints, it helped us a lot.
Entries.Tue2: Yri is always working on new ideas to improve her buildings... #$b# Sometimes we have to stop her so she won't go overboard with it.
Entries.Tue4: Yri overworked herself again, Maru and i forced her to see Dr. Harvey.$a#$b# I wish she would listen to us and rest a day.$s
Entries.Sun2: I just had tea with Yri the other day, we talked about new designs for future projects.$h
Entries.Sun4: Hello @, I'm sorry, I'm quite busy, Yri is coming over so we can go over some projects.$h

Entries.Wed2: It's always nice to talk with Yri, she stops by often, especially when she needs inspiration for her work $h
Entries.Wed4: Yri loves Juice. I make sure to have enough at home in case she visits.#$b# Do you want some too?$h
Entries.Thu: I moved to Stardew Valley not too long ago, Yri was one of the first people I met.#$b# We love similar things so we instantly clicked.$h
Entries.Thu2: Do you want to see my newest work? Yri and I worked together on it.$h

Entries.Mon: Yri? Oh you mean the architect from East Scarp.#$b# We had business in the past but I don't know her well.$s
Entries.Mon2: About Yri again? I told you I don't know her well.
Entries.Mon8: Greetings @, Yri and I worked out a deal and our relationship improved since then.#$b# I should've talked with her about the truth earlier.#$b#I'm sorry you had to step in, @.
Entries.Mon10: Hello @, Yri and I were talking about some new projects to improve the town image.#$b# Don't worry I already transferred her payment, I don't want that story to repeat.#$b# I know it will take some time but I hope she can trust me again.$h

Entries.Tue2: It was a bit weird when Yri and Charles crashed at our house. But we made it work.#$b# The two are pretty chill.$h
Entries.Tue4: I think Yri and my mother get along so well because both are obsessed with wood.#$b# Don't worry I mean this in a good way.$h

Entries.Fri: My Wife is rather fond of Yri, I still remember the day when Yri and Charles stepped out of Willies boat.#$b# The day after Robin and her were already best friends.$h
Entries.Fri2: Robin and Yri brought me some samples from the woods earlier today.#$b# I'm glad they support my studies like that.$h
Entries.Fri6: Charles and I don't get along. He's such a bright young men but his passiveness and lack of effort will get him nowhere.#$b# I wish he could see that too.

Entries.Wed2: Hello @, you just missed Yri, she stopped by earlier to discuss some business with Robin.

Entries.Sat4: Shortly before the war between Ferngill and Gotoro started I volunteered to pick up exiled foreigners to take them to safety.#$b# Charles and Yri were some of them.
